mv T.F tf
-- x.go --
package p

type T int

func (T) F(x int) int { return 1}

// uses
var _ = T.F(1,2)
var _ = T(1).F(2)
var _ = T.F
var _ = (*T).F
var _ = (*T).F(new(T), 2)
var _ = new(T).F(2)
-- stderr --
x.go:11:14: cannot use pointer method value with function using non-pointer receiver
ERROR: errors applying rewrite
